name: SetVehicleParamsForPlayer
notes: Vehicles must be respawned for the 'objective' to be removed.
warnings: Since 0.3a you will have to reapply this function when OnVehicleStreamIn is called.
description: Set the parameters of a vehicle for a player.

params_body.name: vehicle
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the parameters of.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the vehicle's parameters for.

params_body.name: objective
params_body.description: 0 to disable the objective or 1 to show it. This is a bobbing yellow arrow above the vehicle.

params_body.name: doorslocked
params_body.description: 0 to unlock the doors or 1 to lock them.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player and/or vehicle specified do not exist.
related_fn: SetVehicleParamsEx: Sets a vehicle's params for all players.
